description: This file defines a Python script for an AI agent called DeepKnowledge that performs iterative searches over a knowledge base to answer questions. It includes functions for initializing the knowledge base, creating the agent, and running an interactive question-answering loop, with detailed instructions and features for thorough reasoning and source attribution.

methods.name: initialize_knowledge_base
methods.description: Initializes the knowledge base with a URL and a LanceDb vector database.

methods.name: get_agent_storage
methods.description: Returns the agent storage object for session management.

methods.name: create_agent
methods.description: Creates and configures a DeepKnowledge agent with detailed instructions and context.

methods.name: get_example_topics
methods.description: Provides a list of example questions for the interactive agent.

methods.name: handle_session_selection
methods.description: Handles user input to select or start a new session.

methods.name: run_interactive_loop
methods.description: Runs the main loop for user interaction and question asking.

methods.name: deep_knowledge_agent
methods.description: Main function to initialize and run the DeepKnowledge agent.
